name: Diamond Mining
description:
Diamond Mining
Diamond Mining is about the conquering adventure to a faraway galaxy. In 25th century, human uses diamond to produce anti-cancer drugs; So, the source of this precious gem is out of stock on Earth. The last resort is to find another supply of diamond on other planets.
Are you ready to become a member of diamond mining cruise? Are you able to become an excellent diamond miner in the galaxy?
Main features:
- Move and hold the paddle to ricochet the ball in an unique and special way of controlling.
- Eliminate the galactic stone and get all the diamond
- Super powerful items
- Various challenging levels
